1.title: April for Me, April for You

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Chaz Mannenheim, Newsman Of Yesteryear, is here with a new look, a new suit, and some new insight into the time period he comes from. Witness Chaz at the outset of his journey in our modern times; recollecting the dominating news stories from his era, and with the aid of the man on the street, Chaz brings his unique perspective to the most talked about events in April 2014.

2.title: Time Lapse

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Chaz Mannenheim explores New York City for the first time since his arrival in the modern era.

3.title: Back to My Old Self

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: After finding himself overwhelmed by the influence of the modern era, Chaz Mannenheim, Newsman of Yesteryear, uses every tool at his disposal to regain the style, look, and sound of his 1940s self.

4.title: Childhood

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Chaz Mannenheim sits down to give a vivid account of his experiences, both rural and urban, as a young man in the early 20th Century. Find out how the Newsman Of Yesteryear first became a newsman at all.

5.title: The War Years

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Here for you, viewer, is a whirlwind review of Chaz Mannenheim's most outrageous and powerful moments, taken from his wartime radio broadcasts and all leading to his fateful transportation to our modern age.

6.title: The Computer!

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Chaz Mannenheim demonstrates the exciting, yet uncontrollable, power of his newest technological discovery!

7.title: Halloween Trick

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: In this Halloween special, Chaz Mannenheim takes a walk with a mysterious woman only to show her he has a trick of his own to pull.

8.title: Holiday Treat!

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Join Chaz for his annual holiday preparations. Around the home and out on the wintery and festive streets of NYC, he'll surely get you and yours in the most delightful of holiday spirits.

1.title: Month in Review: January 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Chaz Mannenheim is looking for the Top Stories of January 2013! He takes to the streets to hear what the people have to say about... The Flu! The Oscars! The President! And The News! WATCH and LISTEN and LEARN as Chaz's witty and adroit conversation skills bring you through the adventurous news bulletins that comprised the month of January in the Year of our Lord, 2013!

2.title: Month in Review: February 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: If you're wondering what the Top Stories of February 2013 were, well so is Chaz Mannenheim! But he's on the case, so you don't have to be! WATCH as Chaz talks to the people of NYC about... Olympian David Pistorius and his hot girlfriend (deceased), The Academy Awards, The Disastrous Carnival Cruise and more!! If you like comedy, intrigue, and man on the street interviews then this is the show for you!

3.title: The Pope Resigns! (More Month in Review - Feb 2013)

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: February was an eventful month. Here's another story from February, presented by Chaz Mannenheim, Newsman Of Yesteryear.

4.title: Month in Review: March 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: March 2013 has come and gone, but Chaz Mannenheim has not given up! He wants the news and he's going to get it! THRILL at Grand Central, Madison Square Park, and on the NYC Subway System as Chaz gets the skinny on Pope Francis I, Marriage Equality in America, and a BOOMING Stock Market!!! News reporting has never been so entertaining!

5.title: Month in Review: April 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Chaz Mannenheim is once again seeking out the news and peoples' opinions about said news. And boy, does he get what he's looking for! Laugh and try to stop laughing as Chaz talks to people about the seemingly unfunny material associated with the Boston Marathon Bombing, California's Attractive Attorney General, and the deaths of Margaret Thatcher and Roger Ebert!!

6.title: Month in Review: May 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: What Happened In May 2013?? Someday, People Will Want To Know!!! Chaz Mannenheim Is Bringing It To You Today!!! That's Right, Yesterday's News, Not Tomorrow, Not Years From Now -- TODAY!!! With the aid of the man on the street, Chaz will enlighten you about what's going on with Angelina Jolie's Mastectomy, The Obama Administration Scandals, and The Sudden Embrace Of Homosexual Love By The Boy Scouts Of America!

7.title: Month in Review: June 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Month in Review: July 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: It's July and Chaz Mannenheim is here to bring you the stories that you already know! Or maybe you don't! Did you hear about George Zimmerman? What about the Royal Baby? Who is Carlos Danger, you ask? Chaz has the answers! And with the help of the man on the street he brings the top-notch kind of commentary!

9.title: Month in Review: August 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Watch Chaz Speak To The Street Urchins Of NYC About That Steroid Pumping Yankee, A-Rod! Gender-Bending Convict Chelsea Manning! The Newest Member Of The Obama Family And More!

10.title: Month in Review: September 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: It's The End Of September And Chaz Mannenheim, Your Host Of Hosts, Is Finding The News Wherever He Can!! On The Street, Chaz Is Digging Up Tales Of Man/Robot Relationships; The Newest, Most Exciting News In Condoms; and of course, All The Hullabaloo About Syria!! See Chaz Mannenheim Talking To The Man On The Street! Getting The Opinions And Personalities Other News Is Just Not Having!!! It's Here, It's Him, It's Time!!!

11.title: Month in Review: October 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: What A SPOOKY Month! Government Shutdown! Pagans Tricking & Treating! Miley Cyrus! These Are The Cultural Events Tackled By Man-About-Town, Chaz Mannenheim, In the Newest Installment Of MONTH IN REVIEW! If You're Ready To Think, Laugh, & Be Scared Then You're Ready For This!

12.title: Month in Review: November 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: This Month Brought Memories Of Tragedy And Thoughts Of Good Cheer Indeed!!! Chaz Mannenheim, your Newsman Of Yesteryear, brings to you the meaty substance of today's most popular news stories including the Toronto Mayor's hilarious addiction crisis, the unending enigma that is the JFK assassination, and the always entertaining answer to the question, "What Are You Doing For Thanksgiving!!!" Thrill as Chaz Mannenheim brings you all the news you missed and all the news you love!!!

13.title: Year in Review: 2013

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: WOW! What A Year! Political Intrigue, Religious Reformation, Pop Stars With Butts RIGHT Up In Our Faces! CHAZ MANNENHEIM, Your Newsman Of Yesteryear, Sits Down With Bearcats Rebecca Vigil And Jo Firestone To Bring You The Skinny On The TOP Stories Of 2013!

1.title: Month in Review: January 2014

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: January 2014 Thrilled and CHILLED All Who Participated! A Polar Vortex Swept Us Up Like Brides On A Wedding Night! Chris Christie Put The Hoagie Down Just Long Enough To Get Into Trouble! Justin Bieber Surprised Nobody By Drag Racing, Drinking, Getting Arrested, And Looking As Ridiculous As He Is! HEAR Me Discuss These Issues With Local NYC WitMasters!

2.title: Month in Review: February 2014

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: February 2014 Made Us Believe! Made Us Cry! Made Us Angry! Made Us Wonder! WHAT Is Going On In Kiev? WHY Did Philip Seymour Hoffman Leave Us So Soon? WHO Cares About The Olympics? These Questions Will Be Thought Through And Answered With The Comic Adroitness Of One Of Those Fake Arrows Through The Head!

3.title: Month in Review: March 2014

episode of.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: March 2014! A MONTH Where Russia Did Dirty In Crimea! A MONTH Where Malaysian Planes Fell Out Of The Sky! A MONTH Where Hollywood's Finest Gave Each Other Awards And Made Us Watch It For FOUR HOURS! These Stories And More... Well Just These Stories Brought To You By The One And Only Chaz Mannenheim, Newsman Of Yesteryear! With The Aid Of The Most Entertaining People On The Street You've Ever Met!

imdb.plot outline: A 1930s era newsman finds himself in the modern-day, fascinated and enticed by all the aspects of 21st Century culture.
imdb.title: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear!
akas: Chaz Mannenheim: Newsman of Yesteryear! (United States)
plot: A 1930s era newsman finds himself in the modern-day, fascinated and enticed by all the aspects of 21st Century culture.::anonymous
